dublin_core.dcvalue: mHealth for Safer Deliveries is a set of services that enables traditional birth attendants (TBAs) and midwives to ensure safe pregnancies and deliveries by identifying obstetric emergencies and utilizing Ezy Pesa to transfer money for obstetric-related transportation.
CHW, Clinics, Facility-Based Health care worker, National health system, Patient
Marc Mitchell, President, D-tree International, Email: mmitchel@hsph.harvard.edu | Ken Warman, Gates Foundation, Email: ken.warman@gatesfoundation.org
The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation
mHealth For Safer Deliveries: EZY Pesa Mobile Banking Service
Electronic decision support, Financial transactions and incentives, Provider-to-provider communication, Provider training and education, Maternal Health
